metadata.dc:description: A case is presented of spontaneous rupture in a pathological bladder. The authors point out the importance of retrograde cystographies to reveal intraperitoneal ruptures in te bladder and to check for the existence of associated lesions. A review is made of the etiology, clinical picture and treatment of spontaneous, intraperitoneal rupture of the bladder.
metadata.dc:title: Rotura espont치nea de vejiga patol칩gica: aportaci칩n de un caso.
[Spontaneous rupture of a pathological bladder: contribution of a case].
